posts.name: Ryan Moore
posts.cooked:
40bag drivetrain iso 1650×1038 183 KB

40bag drivetrain iso 1650×1038 183 KB

40bag drivetrain iso 1650×1038 183 KB

So when reading through the 2023 rules I found a small rule that could’ve made a very stupid design possible. I started work on this design before the Motor Rule Changes for the 2024 Season came out making this project illegal for the 2024 season and beyond.

Overview:

40 BAG Motors

Weighs 52 lbs with no electronics, bumpers, or battery

27" x 21" West Coast Drivetrain

<6" Tall for low COG

Uses combination of 4" Traction Wheels and 4" DuraOmni wheels

R504 Each power regulating device may control electrical loads per Table 9-2. Unless otherwise noted, each power regulating device shall control 1 and only 1 electrical load. r504 table 9-2 648×688 79.6 KB

r504 table 9-2 648×688 79.6 KB

r504 table 9-2 648×688 79.6 KB

This rule shows that 2 BAG motors may be connected to 1 motor controller and since the REV PDH has 20 slots this implies that 20 motor controllers each controlling  2 motors is legal.

5 BAG Gearbox 911×908 67.5 KB image 906×899 30.8 KB

5 BAG Gearbox 911×908 67.5 KB

5 BAG Gearbox 911×908 67.5 KB

image 906×899 30.8 KB

image 906×899 30.8 KB

The 1st stage is made with a .5" Hex Bore, 32DP, 85 tooth gear and 5 .125" Round Bore, 32DP, 12 tooth Pinion Gear bored out to fit on the 5mm shaft of the BAG Motor.

The second stage uses a .5" Hex Bore, 20DP, 24 tooth gear and a .5" Hex Bore, 20DP, 43 tooth gear . Overall with the 4" wheels it should* achieve a free speed of 18.13 ft/s

image 1051×988 32.2 KB There’s even space to mount a Rev Through Bore Encoder for maximum precision! *obviously this drivetrain would not work with the high power draw of using 40 motors for the drivetrain but it was a fun cad project.

image 1051×988 32.2 KB

image 1051×988 32.2 KB

40 BAG Frame and wheels 1804×1118 145 KB

40 BAG Frame and wheels 1804×1118 145 KB

40 BAG Frame and wheels 1804×1118 145 KB

The frame is made out of Rev MaxTube and put together with T gussets and tube plugs for the a strong West Coast Drivetrain.

40 BAG Frame 1833×1091 123 KB

40 BAG Frame 1833×1091 123 KB

40 BAG Frame 1833×1091 123 KB
